includedAssets.title: Phase Six
includedAssets.synopsis: The fate of mankind rests on the crew of a lone naval ship when the world is gripped by a deadly virus. Epic drama exec-produced by Michael Bay.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The fate of mankind rests on the crew of a lone naval ship when the world is gripped by a deadly virus. Epic drama exec-produced by Michael Bay.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The fate of mankind rests on the crew of a lone naval ship when the world is gripped by a deadly virus. Epic drama exec-produced by Michael Bay.

includedAssets.title: Welcome To Gitmo
includedAssets.synopsis: A ground mission to Guantanamo Bay takes a turn for the worse when Chandler and his comrades are attacked by escaped prisoners.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A ground mission to Guantanamo Bay takes a turn for the worse when Chandler and his comrades are attacked by escaped prisoners.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A ground mission to Guantanamo Bay takes a turn for the worse when Chandler and his comrades are attacked by escaped prisoners.

includedAssets.title: Dead Reckoning
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler and co face a formidable new foe who has his sights set on Rachel and her research, culminating in a series of risky strategic moves.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler and co face a formidable new foe who has his sights set on Rachel and her research, culminating in a series of risky strategic moves.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler and co face a formidable new foe who has his sights set on Rachel and her research, culminating in a series of risky strategic moves.

includedAssets.title: We'll Get There
includedAssets.synopsis: The USS Nathan James faces another threat to its survival when its ability to generate fresh water and electricity is compromised.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The USS Nathan James faces another threat to its survival when its ability to generate fresh water and electricity is compromised.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The USS Nathan James faces another threat to its survival when its ability to generate fresh water and electricity is compromised.

includedAssets.title: El Toro
includedAssets.synopsis: A tough moral dilemma looms for Chandler and his crew when they encounter a drug dealer-turned-dictator during a jungle-based mission.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A tough moral dilemma looms for Chandler and his crew when they encounter a drug dealer-turned-dictator during a jungle-based mission.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A tough moral dilemma looms for Chandler and his crew when they encounter a drug dealer-turned-dictator during a jungle-based mission.

includedAssets.title: Lockdown
includedAssets.synopsis: Panic spreads like wildfire when Lt Danny Green comes down with a mysterious illness. Chandler, meanwhile, starts to have doubts about Rachel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Panic spreads like wildfire when Lt Danny Green comes down with a mysterious illness. Chandler, meanwhile, starts to have doubts about Rachel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Panic spreads like wildfire when Lt Danny Green comes down with a mysterious illness. Chandler, meanwhile, starts to have doubts about Rachel.

includedAssets.title: SOS
includedAssets.synopsis: Chandler and Tex launch a rescue attempt after picking up a distress call, but good intentions backfire when a surprise attack leaves them stranded at sea.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chandler and Tex launch a rescue attempt after picking up a distress call, but good intentions backfire when an attack leaves them stranded at sea.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Chandler and Tex launch a rescue attempt after picking up a distress call, but good intentions backfire when a surprise attack leaves them stranded at sea.

includedAssets.title: Two Sailors Walk Into A Bar...
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - Two Sailors Walk Into A Bar...
includedAssets.synopsis: Slattery must decide between saving his comrades or the fate of the world when mad Russian Ruskov issues his demands.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Slattery must decide between saving his comrades or the fate of the world when mad Russian Ruskov issues his demands.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Slattery must decide between saving his comrades or the fate of the world when mad Russian Ruskov issues his demands.

includedAssets.title: Trials
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel asks for six volunteers to take part in her human vaccine trials. Back in the states, Chandler's family are put in a perilous situation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rachel asks for six volunteers to take part in her human vaccine trials. Back in the states, Chandler's family are put in a perilous situation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rachel asks for six volunteers to take part in her human vaccine trials. Back in the states, Chandler's family are put in a perilous situation.

includedAssets.title: No Place Like Home
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep10 - No Place Like Home
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael Bay's action-packed drama concludes. The crew of the USS Nathan James head home, only to find the world has irrevocably changed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael Bay's action-packed drama concludes. The crew of the USS Nathan James head home, only to find the world has irrevocably changed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael Bay's action-packed drama concludes. The crew of the USS Nathan James head home, only to find the world has irrevocably changed.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: With most of the population wiped out by a global pandemic, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must find a way to stop the virus and save what remains of humanity. Epic action drama exec-produced by Michael Bay.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With most of the population wiped out by a virus, the crew of a naval destroyer strive to save what remains of humanity. Exec-produced by Michael Bay.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With most of the population wiped out by a global pandemic, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must find a way to stop the virus and save what remains of humanity. Epic action drama exec-produced by Michael Bay.

includedIn.title: The Last Ship
includedIn.synopsis: When a global pandemic wipes out most of the world’s population, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must find a way to stop the virus and save what remains of humanity.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: When a global pandemic wipes out most of the population, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must stop the virus and save humanity.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When a global pandemic wipes out most of the world’s population, the crew of an unaffected naval destroyer must find a way to stop the virus and save what remains of humanity.
